scripts.build:types: npx wasm-api-bindgen -a wasm-types-analysis.json --lang ts -o src/generated/types.ts --lang zig -o zig/generated/types.zig src/typedefs.json
scripts.build:zig: zig build && wasm-opt src/main.wasm -o src/main.wasm -Oz && wasm-dis -o src/main.wast src/main.wasm
scripts.build:zig-prod: zig build -Drelease-small && wasm-opt src/main.wasm -o src/main.wasm -Oz && wasm-dis -o src/main.wast src/main.wasm
